name: Yuzo
title: It makes me happy
text: It distracts me from the fact that I have no friends

name: Sarah
title: Do not buy any Sony products through Amazon!
text: Worked for a few months beforethe hard drive died for no apparent reason. The power supply works only to display a hard drive failure message. After contacting Sony and Amazon, Sony admits there was a hard drive issue with the model but claims Amazon is responsible to replace it, Amazon claims Sony is responsible to replace it. Do not buy a Sony products through amazon!

name: Junior
title: Scaaaamed!
text: I just realize this now, year later it's not 1tb it's 500 gbs LOOL! I deserve this for not knowing sooner

name: Nobody Important
title: A great all-in-one console,
text: I really love my new PS4 Slim, it's great, easy to setup and has a tons more options.Pros:Current Gen Console as of 2/28/2018Alot faster than the PS3 in generalTons of free gamesPlaystation Now is a pretty decent deal and has a wide selectionTons of media apps like netflix, hulu, amazon video, funimation, etc...Controller allows you to change brightness of glowTons of customization options to suit your console to you (including high contrast)Playstation plus seems to offer better deals for digital.Cons:No more composite output, which means I can't get audio through my pc the easy wayWhen you are downloading many items there can be menu lagSome apps tend to glitch and close application isn't an option. However, you can easily just restart.I got this because I had no reason to get the PS4 Pro, I don't have a 4K TV nor do I really care about 4K Gaming (and the 6-8 games that are supported for 4K on the Pro.) Honestly I just found this to be a better deal, as the Pro just seems to be a lazy cashgrab. It definitely is slim and fits into pretty much any keyboard space (for those of you with multiple desks like me.)Pretty much the ideal console in my opinion.

name: Yinong
title: Slim is just fine.
text: If you do not have a 4K TV, then you do not need PS4 pro.Slim is just fine.

name: Shariece
title: So much faster than Original Playstation 4
text: I’ve had the original PS4 system since it came and and have long run out of space on the 500GB hard drive so I decided to buy a newer updated version of the PS4.. the ps4 slim is awesome. There is a very noticeable performance between my slim and the original. The network connection on my slim is twice as good, games load much faster, download times are much quicker and most importantly I have twice as much HD space for games. I don’t even play a lot of games but still somehow ran out. If you’re noticing a decline in performance on your original ps4 you should definitely invest in a new with plus you can add on a 4 year warranty.

name: Lost Pathfinder
title: Excellent
text: So. This was an easy process. Up until the software update. NOTHING TO DO WITH THE SELLER. In short please place a few hours aside for the software update.  Each game you buy will have game updates. Each app you install (Amazon Netflix etc);will need to update . Very easy to use but put some time aside (if u have kids dont tell them you have it until updates are installed.Clean packed great all items included. No issues and, so far (less than 24 hrs), works fine

name: J S.
title: AMAZON provided an excellent Product, Excellent protection to ship
text: AMAZON provided an excellent Product, Excellent protection to ship, and Excellent Product PS 4 - I have had all the previous Playstation Game machines, and do warn PS 4 buyers that SONY has never implemented ability to play U R PS 2 or PS 3 games on its PS4 system.PS 4 literature in box says they have BACKWARD COMPATIBILITY - but that is a "LIE".XBOX ONE does have BACKWARD COMPATIBILITY on previous games. NOT SONY w/ its PS4.The PS4 is an excellent product w/ 1 T'bite Storage and also uses less electricity than the 500GB storage models.AMAZON packaging was great when received. no complaints there. No complaints of the PS 4 either at this stage.So far I love it!But hate the NO PS 4 backward Compatibility, even with PLAYSTATION PLUS which is required to play & view ONLINE INTERNET.So Buyers who want to get in on PS 4 ground floor BUY only games that have ability to PLAY standalone, to get started.

name: Lyn Torres
title: Wrong item received!
text: Very disappointed, I received the 500gb PS4 instead of the 1tb I purchased.Also, serial number is a bit shady, it starts with MG instead of the normal MC or MB.It says “Amazon’s Choice” on the item so I bought it with confidence...Will return and will never buy consoles on Amazon again.

name: chefhoeyardee
title: STOPPED WORKING FIRST FEW MINUTES
text: Seriously DO NOT BUY THIS. I was looking forward to this all week, even got a game and headset for it. I come home, hook it up, and it works just fine. I'm going through setting up my account and as I'm putting in my card info for PlayStation plus, it shuts off out of no where. I try to plug it into a different outlet, still doesn't work. I press the power button, nothing. When it does come on, it's on for no longer than a few minutes. I can hear a slight staticy sound when I move the power cord around. Sometimes it'll even shut off with a static screen on the TV as it shuts off. This isn't just a simple overheating problem, this is a defective console. I'm assuming the seller receives faulty consoles that other unhappy consumers have returned and just resells them for cheap instead of actually fixing them. RIDICULOUS. Now I have to wait over a week to get my money back and I MIGHT try to get a different console, but you can bet I'm staying FARRRR away from Amazon. Thanks for wasting my time.

name: Erik
title: Good Games, But..
text: I like the  PS and have always been a fan; the games are great, but that is a matter of opinion, so I'm giving the system 2 stars based on the system itself and my experience. I guess it goes without saying it hasn't been great. I had to replace my first PS because the infamous disc-eject issue. I tried everything but it just kept happening. My second PS is this slim edition. So far so good (hasn't broken), but compared to any system I've ever had (maybe beside the NES) it freezes the most, sometimes it just goes extremely slow in menus to the point you almost have to walk away before it's operational. It's also froze a few times without the power button being able to shut it off so you have to unplug, I assume, which has caused corrupted data, which has caused me to have to a reset. Literally the only other person I know with a PS, whom is a close Cousin of mine, has had to replace 2 systems already. We've ranted about how awful our experience has been with the PS4 on more than one occasion being that we've bought 5 systems between two people...for two people. I'm not saying anybody shouldn't buy one, more than likely yours will work, I'm sure, but I still feel the need to put in my 2 cents.

name: Michael Vivirito
title: Unwilling to work with the customer
text: They sold me a PlayStation with a faulty disk drive they wanted me to go through the hassle of returning the console after I already had games downloaded and my account setup and wouldn’t give me some kind of refund

name: Megan Morrow
title: Defective product!
text: The ps4 was defective. Everything seemed to work properly but when I downloaded a game, I could not open it. Every time I tried I just got an error code.

name: Jonathan
title: Meh...
text: I wanted to discover what all the excitement about gaming and game consoles was about. Honestly, if you'e never done this sort of thing before, skip it. Reading a book, or going for a walk beat this type of entertainment easily. I can see how a child might be captivated by it; but not a fully functional adult.I spent about $200 on a variety of different types of games to see which one was right for me. Just figuring out how the controller works in most games is a deterrent. In any event, once you get the hang of that, "gaming" is a bit time consuming. At best, your mind becomes immersed in the game environment, and before long, you notice a few hours have passed. The entertainment value you gain for the hours of investment is mediocre at best. Go to a movie, it's cheaper and sticks with you longer.Now that I've got this thing, I'll continue to use it and explore more games. If I had it to do over again, I'd stay at a nice hotel for a weekend for the same money I spent on this device and be a bit happier for it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not Recommended For Youtubers and Hardcore Gamers!
text: While the system was working it was awesome, but the main issues I had on the system was every time the console updated, It had issues with coming back on. i am not sure if it was the software issue or my settings on my PS4, plus my console was getting really hot after about 5hrs of play, and I am a youtuber and gamer, so I play a lot throughout my work week and when I am off.So if you are like me as a gamer that requires continuous play of lets plays on LiveStream,I strongly recommend you pay the extra green and get the Pro Version.This model is fine for a casual gamer, but this machine tends to have many bugs and issues.I had to send mine in to playstation twice for them to get my console back on.Not very reliable for a hardcore gamer.

name: Charmen
title: So Many Uses, Super Fun!
text: I haven't stopped using this since I bought it! I have so much fun playing my games on here, streaming movies/videos and my personal favorite: listening to Spotify! It's amazing and has a nice, modern, sleek interface. If you're already familiar with Playstation, then it isn't as hard to use (so many button have so many uses), but if you aren't a faithful Playstation user, you may have a little difficulty remembering which button does what. Since I am a faithful PS user, I'm gonna go ahead and give it 5 stars because the buttons weren't an issue for me. 10/10 would recommend.

name: Jubilant
title: now I can enjoy many outstanding playstation exclusive games such as the uncharted ...
text: got this on the blackfriday dealcame on time, works well, everything's in order. now I can enjoy many outstanding playstation exclusive games such as the uncharted series and horizon zero dawn

name: Brittany
title: Love it!
text: It was pretty easy to set up. I bought it to share with my boyfriend and it's very easy to keep our different save files for our games separate. Both parties have access to the different games that have been downloaded even if only one bought the digital game. The only thing I would complain about is that we can't have two separate netflix log ins saved onto it. It has the one account preloaded all the time. The control are what you would expect and a little more. Sometimes, depending on the game, the controller will light up differently to show your health or in response to what a character is saying. The last console we had before this was a ps2 so, we're still pretty amazed by it, haha.

name: Christopher
title: Get one will not regret
text: Five stars for the ps4,  Zero stars for the packaging the Ps4 came in. This is my second PlayStation, my first one was the original Ps1 still have it. But this ps4 is so awesome, there is a lot of free demos to download so you do not have to buy games unless there is that game you got to have. Alot of stuff to do with this console it is just not a game console.

name: Dames
title: Awesome Console but controller keeps disconnecting
text: So after waiting a little while I finally got my PS4 console. It's an amazing device and I really love it but one concern is that for some strange reason my controller disconnects every 5 minutes while maneuvering through my games library or even while gaming. This is really annoying and costs me dearly as it disconnects while playing, forcing me to push the little button behind to reset it every time. I know its the controller because even when I go to settings and change the connection from Bluetooth to USB cable it does the same thing. Shame my return window is closed, I'll just have to buy another controller, could have used that money to pre-order Spiderman but such is life I guess. Other than my control glitch its a good buy and a good console.

name: Robert Green
title: Nice size and plenty of hard drive space
text: Nice size and plenty of hard drive space, great deal for the price. I haden't purchased a new console since the Wii having been mostly PC at this point, but a few of the playstation exclusives sold me on getting on and I'm very happy with it.

name: MamaOwl
title: Wrong model received initially, but customer service was fantastic.
text: I was sent the wrong model; I received a 500GB instead of a 1TB like advertised. The PS4 works fine, came with everything. However, it was the wrong model. I contacted the seller and they were verylond and understanding on the mistake. I sent pictures for proof. I didn't want to return it because it was fine, worked, and I bought it to play a game on its release date the next day after it arrived. They were really sweet about listening to my concern about storage space and my disappointment on how I installed all my games and the storage was almost out (and it was literally 4 games) and that's why I bought a 1TB instead of a 500gb like I received - the storage space, as that was my only real concern. After speaking about how to resolve it, me mentioning I could get an external drive, I just didn't have the money at the moment because I spent all my funds on what I assumed would be a 1TB model and the new game I bought it for - they gave me a discount refund for 50$, so I could purchase an external hard drive for storage to make up for me not having a 1TB model. Customer service was great, I didn't have a problem other than being sent the wrong model for storage, which they helped me resolve with partial, small refund.  I was disappointed because of the storage issue, but with their help and understanding and customer support, I'm able to say I'm very content and happy with my purchase. :) If you ever get a wrong model or something is broken when you buy something, always contact your seller - theyight be able to help! Especially if it's not anything you did.

name: Leon
title: Do not purchase if you have a Denon receiver!!!!
text: Within weeks of purchasing this item, I began having problems with the HDMI pass through with my Denon receiver. It worked well for a few days, then I began getting errors from the receiver. I tried different HDMI slots and got the same error messages. When I contacted Sony concerning this issue, they advised that this was not there problem. When I contacted Denon technical support, they indicated that this was a well known problem, specifically with PS4 consoles. Steer clear if you have any make of Denon receiver.

name: TJ Werner
title: Connection Sucks!!!
text: Honestly not impressed by this machine. Bought it to replace my 2 year old PS4 that was lost in a fire and my old PS4 was way faster than this one. My current roommate has had his original PS4 since they were first released and his is still quicker and doesn't have nearly the connection issues. I have to set up internet connection almost Everytime I turn it on and feel like I was really ripped off.  Save your money and just get a regular one.

name: Manuel Sanchez Morales
title: One Star
text: Nunca logró llegar

name: Serum
title: A little harder to navigate than the PS3, but still worth it
text: This was a gift I received. I've been a PlayStation 3 user since late 2012, in fact, it was my first Blu-Ray player. I tend to get consoles at the end of their lifetimes, when all the bugs are worked out and all the good games for them have already been released. The PlayStation 4 is no different. I got the Slim model, with a 1TB hard drive. Back in December of 2012, I bought the ultra-Slim, 500GB model of the PS3. Seven years FROM now, I imagine I'll be doing something similar with the PlayStation 5. I've been a PlayStation user since Nintendo released the Wii, which I simply had no interest in playing and bought a slim PlayStation 2 at the time.  So now I'm a PS4 user and I've got to say, it's not quite what I expected but it's alright.PROS: It has an excellent selection of games, I don't play many titles, but I have five games for it, so far and they're all bought through the PlayStation Store. I've pretty much given up on physical copies because I've run out of room for more cases on my shelves, which are already covered in DVDs, Blu-Rays and books. The one terabyte hard drive simplifies this, as it'll probably awhile until I run out of room and need an external hard drive for this puppy. But I like the games I have, which are "Always Sometimes Monsters," "Stardew Valley,"  "Catherine: Full Body," "Persona 5" and "Death Stranding." I still have plenty of room left on my hard drive and I think buying physical copies is just a tradition some people don't want to break.CONS: Clunky user interface. I'm still confused by where all my games and apps are. On the surface it seems like it's going to be even simpler than using the PlayStation 3's user interface, but it's actually quite confusing to navigate. At least I think it is. I go to my "TV & Video" folder and instead of having just the apps I have downloaded (Amazon Prime and Netflix) it shows me like, six other app "suggestions" (advertisements, really) that they think I should download and pay for those services when I have absolutely zero interest in them. I've been told there are ways around this, but I'm confused as to how to go about fixing it as I'm not the tech-savvy person I was ten years ago, anymore. But I'm still figuring this beast out.So in conclusion, it's a good system with good games, a good Blu-Ray player and a good amount of hard drive space for the price but it has a very clunky user interface that leaves me often times feeling bewildered. Like I said, I got this for free, so I'm not complaining, I have a lot of learning to do with it. One other thing I want to add is that the controller battery life seems a little short-lived for some reason. I don't know if that's just something I'm imagining or what, but it definitely doesn't seem to last as long as the PlayStation 3's controller. But all in all, it's a pretty good system and I like what I've gotten on it a lot so far so at least I have that going for me. I guess I'll give this one a solid four out five stars.

name: chad JJ
title: gotta be honest about this system it's a mix bag for me
text: what i do like about this system is that every game is ultra realistic and in hd but that's when the Praise stops from me because the negatives are alot like one being a small library of games and every games from other generations from ps1 ps2 & ps3 are getting ported into this console to be in hd for remastered which kills the potential that this system did had well for me because the only thing ppl keep asking for is a remasters from other PlayStation systems how do u expect this to evolve? to me this is the ps vita of home consoles that barely offers any initiative games  oh the only way to Play online is to buy Ps plus which starts from 10+ to 60+ dollars which is backwards since "PS3 COST NOTHING" to play online and doesn't hassle to buy anything in order neither. what makes ps4 even wost is that in the modern age of gaming we're in the loot box era so not only that u be spending 60+ if u want the Ps plus which are monthly but u also have to play games of chance if u are a fan of nba2k, fifa, star wars, all of the battle royale games: Overwatch, Apex Legends, Fortnite and etc. even wwe 2k games has loot boxes it's sad i really missed thq at least they never Put out cash grabs unlike 2k.so my point is this if u want to pay 500, 400, &300 for this system including fee to play games  and a monthly required Ps plus just to play online with friends then this console is for u if u want to just enjoy games without any fee to play games and that doesn't require Ps Plus and have fun like what gaming used to be and supposed to be without having any greedy gaming publishers being in your wallet then i recommend buying a ps3 it may not be graphical but at least u can have fun and do not get pressured on spending like in the current era of gaming. so i give this a three in a half stars its great but too many others things in this era ruins it's Potential and it's way too much greed going on these days including Sony in current gen.

name: Jada B
title: Beyond dissapointed.
text: I am in my 30's and I have never written a review in my life, but am so upset with this purchase I felt compelled.When I received my package, it took one glance to see that it had been through the ringer.The shipping box was squashed and ripped open. The tape that should hold it all together was half way from falling off. The bubble wrap inside was completely deflated, each and every bubble had a hole rubbed into it.The PlayStation box itself was worn and faded on the entirety of its edges. Even the corners were flattened.In short, my $300 purchase looked like it was kicked all the way from the seller to my house.I am beyond dissapointed.

name: T. Herbert
title: meh
text: If you like playing online and don't mind paying for a subscription to do it, you'll probably like this console. The Ps2 was the last great system. The only reason my PS3 wasn't a dust collector was because of Gran Turismo 5 and 6. With GT Sport being basically online only, my PS4 is pretty much a glorified web browser. Mediocre games with great graphics will never beat the PS2's great games with decent graphics.

name: Scarlett
title: Arrived damaged
text: I ordered it used and in new condition and when the package arrived, PS4 glitched out and shut my whole T.V. down. At first, I thought it was the T.V.'s compatibility so I bought a new T.V. Still glitched so I tried getting a new HDMI and it still didn't work. Finally, I thought it was the "God Of War" disk and so I tried other games... I'm very upset.

name: Derek & Margie
title: Wonderful.
text: Arrived on time, no damage, everything included as advertised. Way better than the Xbox One it replaced. No more constant updates and the updates it does need are so much faster. Not only that but I can simply not update the thing if I choose. Take that Microsoft! The console menus are so much easier to navigate and I don't have to go online to save game progress. So much better.

name: Steven Cordero
title: Perfect Upgrade
text: Perfect upgrade for anyone looking to improve on their original PS4 without making the jump to the PS4 Pro.I bought the original PS4 for my son's 9th birthday and 5 years later it has gotten slower, louder and overheats quicker. The PS4 began freezing up recently and the eject mechanism stopped working. Rather than spending money on a repair, it became obvious that a new system was needed. The question was whether it should be the PS4 Slim or PS4 Pro.  I chose the Slim because it was an obvious upgrade over the original PS4, but far less than what I spent on the original system when it came out (I bought it not long after the launch). It's quieter, faster and doesn't overheat.  Plus, it was far cheaper than the PS4 Pro.  I also bought a new 2TB HD, which I installed, and the total price (PS4 Slim and 2TB HD) was less than what the PS4 Pro is currently going for.  Of course, the PS4 Pro has its advantages, but if you're a longtime PS4 user looking for an upgrade over your old system at the right price, you can't go wrong with the PS4 Slim.

name: G
title: do not attempt to use anything but a high-speed cable modem for downloading and that takes forever
text: Difficult to set up it takes forever to download anything if you don't absolutely have a high-speed internet connection you can forget playing your game system and spend the weekend or the next decade downloading stuff and now they come with games but they all come with downloadable games they don't actually give you a hard copy so you can play right away which is what kids want to do with their PlayStations not stare to download screen

name: Evelyn
title: Do not buy from this seller
text: Bought it, tried it and after 5 minutes, gets too hot and shuts down. Impossible to play.

name: Alex
title: I received everything in good order, but. . .
text: I had gone around to different local stores looking for a Playstation 4 slim, but all the stores had were Pro's.  I went on Amazon, and found the first site selling PS4 units and the line "Amazon's choice for PS4's"  So I thought that was a good sign so I went ahead and placed my order.  Long story short, the package came in a few days, and there was no damage and everything seemed to be accounted for.  The actual PS4 works well so far.  I have had it one month tomorrow the 14th.  A few days ago, and the main reason for 3 stars is, the controller stopped working out of the blue.  I went online and tried ever trouble shooting tip under the sun, but it seems as through it's a dud.  I went and bought a new controller and works fine, but all this lead me to wonder if I had gotten a used or refurbished model?  Everything looks and feels new, and it is probably just that the controller was defective from the factory.  I have read several reviews from people who said their PS4's have given up the ghost after a couple months.  Overall I am happy with the unit but the bum controller made me raise an eyebrow.  I am by no means whatsoever insinuating that this company did a bait and switch or mis-represented itself.  Flukes happen, so take this review for what it's worth.

name: Maria Villanueva
title: Corrupted and doesn’t work.
text: It was running smoothly until I tried to play a game on it. It began to freeze and mess up the data. Now I’m stuck because the PS4 won’t start and the DualShock controller won’t connect even though it is fully charged and has the wire connected.Must be internal hard drive problems, I just received it and it has be sitting around because it freezes mid download so I cannot play a single game. Also once the game downloads it says that there is data corruption and I must delete it. After the 3rd time downloading this 90gb game I call quits. I am stumped.

name: Kenneth Thompson
title: Find a better retailer
text: Refuse to power on after a few months only reason I bought because other retailers were sold out and it was a birthday gift I contact sony immediately they couldn't even verify my purchase I'm sending it in now to sony I didnt even bother Amazon because I know they would be on some bs I hope I dont have to end up replacing it out my own pocket

name: Ann
title: Junk
text: Doesnt read disks, makes a noise when attempting to read, missing the controller(came with a game in the system) Dissapointed, this was supposed to be a gift for my son and now I wont have it in time while i wait for my refund so i can go buy a new one. Wont buy pre-owned ever again. I figured they would check the system prior to sending it out.

name: Alejo Luna
title: Fast shipping
text: Fast shipping! Great product. I love it

name: C.C.
title: Great system
text: There's a lot of great games for the PS4 so this is a good buy. As a console it's decent, sort of sleek looking, and comes with a controller, AC cable, and HDMI cable. The 1TB storage is generous and seems like too much to ever fill up. You can play DVDs and BluRays too, and it will play European games in the USA just fine though some games will not have DLC available due to the region mismatch so be careful.I think the PS4 user interface is pretty garbage and the media sharing doesn't work as well as it does on the Switch, but beyond that it's a solid system. If you've used the PS3 or PSP you'll feel right at home with the UI on the PS4.

name: Steampunk-Scorpio
title: So far so great
text: I have set it up, and so far all is well. It was a bit dirty the console, and that's why I took away a star. Other than that, I'm satisfied and will keep updates on quality- I promise. It came as specified and was well packed, everything was wrapped in sealed plastic except the console itself, I don't know if they even still do that sort of thing so it is what it is. It had a great unused discount card with it. And strangely came with a disc of Uncharted right in the mouth of the console. Strange. It makes me wonder if I should better check the model because the description said nothing about that. I'm not complaining, it's just that the 500 comes with it, and the 1tb does not.

name: Laquever
title: So far so good
text: So far so good my son loves it and it’s working good shipping was pretty fast too

title: Sony is still at the top!
text: I may may have bought this console late in its life, but not so late as to miss the opportunity to appreciate the fourth console in the lineup. This is actually on par with the PlayStation 2 (keep in mind, this is just one person's opinion). I say this because the PS2 still has a place in my heart since its debut in 2000.I've always preferred the PlayStation over Microsoft's Xbox, since it has an amazing first-party library compared to its competitor: Uncharted, Yakuza, Horizon: Zero Dawn. The controller is another reason that I choose this over Xbox; it just feels more precise. (I apologize to anyone reading this who is a dedicated Xbox gamer. I'm not insulting it; rather, I'm just pointing out my preferences in a video game. I've played every generation of the Xbox and I like it, but my choice is elsewhere)I can't wait to play the remake of Resident Evil 2. I played the original back in the day on the first Playstation, so gaming on its descendant console will be like a time-honored tradition.Long story short, I love this console and I'm glad I saved my money to purchase it!

name: Ismael Valverde
title: 10/10 Papa!!!! <3
text: First I was afraid that my PS4 came broken or something, but it didn’t happen. Contrary, It came brand new and without any incovinients. The box include one controller and its charger cord, a headphone, HDMI cord and the plug cord for the ps4, and the PS4 of course. I higly recommend :v

name: A. Boettcher
title: Broke right after warranty expired
text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. He loved it and had a lot of fun with it... right up until it stopped working 2 months after the warranty expired. Convenient, huh? We’ve talked to Sony and none of their troubleshooting options worked, so now we have to decide if we’re going to pay $100 plus shipping to have it fixed. Super frustrated with the PlayStation’s lack of durability. When you spend $300 on something, you expect it to last.

name: CW
title: Very disappointed
text: I’m very disappointed in this. I’ve been a loyal PlayStation customer since the original (yes I’m older) and this one started having problems 5 months in. How convenient. I feel like I’ve been screwed here, as the window to return has passed and if I want to continue investing, I need to buy a new machine. Unless I just happen to be the unluckiest gamer multiple times in a row, somethings wrong here. Id suggest buying from Sony directly, and TBH I’m not even sure this makes a difference

name: Michael
title: Great Console!
text: And with a terabyte of storage, you hardly need disks!A word of caution; if you download games instead of buying the hard disk versions, the software will not let you play those games unless you have some sort of internet connection to verify the usage license. I got this for my truck as I was an over the road truck driver and I found this out the first night I parked up to rest. Luckily, I could use my mobile hotspot feature on my cell phone. You probably won't be playing online with friends, but you can play your downloaded games without a hitch.I highly recommend this system.

name: J&J Z
title: A real solid system!!!
text: Never played with a PS4 before, last system purchased - XBOX360SO - with all the cards on the table - REVIEWComes ready to go, as is. 1 Controller standard with a chargin cable, a cheapy looking 1 ear mic/headset combo that actually works surprisingly well. If you already have a PS4 game, you are ready to play as long as it is not an online game. You have to create a PSN account and at least register a card to the account/system in order to do ANYTHING online. So if your getting this gift for a lucky kid, just know that they will be ON YOU for that info PDQ ... heads up.Outside of that, the hardware is fast. The system boots in under a min and balances the memory load as you play (you wont have the iPad problem of 100 apps open at once and the device performing like junk) It only allows 1 app and 1 game to be left running simultaneously - games look great and the online streaming ability is really cool

name: Stephen G Jones
title: Was great for 1 year, then blue light death
text: worked great for me for awhile. Played plenty of COD and other games here and there. But i hit the year and 2 month mark and i get this "Blue light of death" which does not allow me to turn on, or the instructions to put the device in "Safe Mode" to basically factory reset the device where i lose all data on the device. I have been an Xbox user for the past 10 years owning 2 Xbox 360s and 2 Xbox ones and not once did I have any issues with all 4 of those devices. I was willing to send the device into Playstation to get worked on and serviced, but during these times the workload is limited and they are not doing this work as of now (frustrating but i understand the circumstance and agree with playstation on this one) I just wish i could have had 2 years out of a $300 device from such a quality company..... Im just unimpressed with how this all happened

name: Drew Shields
title: Overall the PS4 is great if you get one that works.
text: My son has had a PS4 for years and it worked great. Unfortunately, our house was struck by lightning which forced me to buy him a new PS4. I ordered a replacement on Amazon. The PS4 i received would not read disc. I requested a replacement for it and sent it back. The second PS4 showed up (bought from the same buyer because it was a "Amazons Choice") and the box was labeled with a damage sticker on the box. I plugged up the second PS4 for my son and it powered on but no signal to the tv. I tried hooking it up to 4 seperate TVs in my house with no luck. I have now requested a refund instead of replacement PS4 and will purchase from someone else.

name: Scrambles
title: I feel like I made a poor decision
text: I don't like the price for a Playstation Plus account, it kind of makes interacting with other players in the world more of an obligation than a leisure thing. Then I lost a lot of over all interest in the product when I found out that I can't play the game I bought without the internet being connected witch means our game play is being monitored by people with a low IQ. I guess the silver lining is that I get to play certain game titles that I would otherwise have to buy an expensive gaming computer for. I most likely will not buy a PS5 when that comes out

name: Lars
title: really bad wifi
text: Im sure i got mine used because it didnt come with a cable to plug into the outlet nor did it have a charger for the controller. It disconnects from the internet constantly and is super frustrating when im playing with friends, seeing how we have to restart a bunch of games because my ps4 just decided to kick me from the server. I've tried connecting to different wifi, deleting some apps, checking my ping, asking on yahoo answer, but it honestly just seems like whoever had it before me, if it was used, messed up the actual hardware for the internet connection (which ive done before too). My only resolution is to keep going into the wifi settings every 10 minutes and "check internet connection," to which it'll say no errors and restore the connection.

name: Jacob Bradley
title: Stuck between a rock and a hard place
text: They sent me a controller with a button that is messed up the X button does not work half the time and sticks and after I originally ordered direct I ended up having to go through this third-party seller and I’m now stuck with a broken PlayStation with no answers from Amazon or the third-party seller and told that it’s all thanks to going through them, teach me to trust Amazon. I ordered direct knowing that it wouldn’t be a hassle if there was a problem but thanks to a technical where I am now left with a shady third-party company and a confused Amazon company and no answers I just had to go buy a replacement from a normal store like I should’ve done in the first place

name: Robin
title: Worked great at first but system/HDD failed after less than a month...
text: I loved the PS4 and the system seemed to work great at first. However, after less than a month, it is having problems. There are frequent crashes and errors, games are not loading, the device gets super hot quickly, and other things. I think it is the HDD causing the issues so I have purchased a new one and hopefully it will fix the issues I am having. I gave it two stars though because, while I am having problems, I loved that short time I got to play the PS4 slim and check out all its cool feature so I would recommend it to anyone who is interested!

name: Deej
title: Had trouble pairing controllers, then it was great.
text: So apparently the controllers (the one included and an extra that we bought) can be finnicky about which USB cords they work with.  The one supplied wasn't letting us pair no matter what I tried but Google told me to try other cords.  We tried like five different ones and the last one worked no problem.  So weird... most people don't seem to have this problem (I asked every teenager I know, no issues) but it's common enough to be online at least.  Other than that, the console and controller have been great and my daughter has really enjoyed playing.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not as advertised, used PS4
text: The only reason I'm giving this 2 stars is for the ease of returning items to Amazon. The product itself was not as advertised. Although this was advertise as a new PS4, it was most definitely used as all contents were simply put into the box loose, no plastic no styrofoam packaging, nothing. Was also obvious in plugging in the console as there was already somebody's profile on the machine which was actually able to be used. Need I mention the security issues there?

name: Ussula
title: Excellent
text: Product was shipped and arrived quickly and in excellent condition. Worked perfectly as soon as I received it. Came with all cords and a controller. Was in original official box (the one I recieved anyways). Not too difficult to learn to navigate the system. Definitely a high quality competitor of Xbox. I bought the console specifically for a couple games thaT are not available on the xbox. The only thing I can think of is that I wish they had a larger mod download limit for certain games that have officially began to allow mods, and I wish they would make more Silent Hill games.

name: MacKenzie Koehn
title: My impressions.
text: First of let me start off by saying the delivery was quicker then I expected. It was supposed to be here between Feb. 10 - 18, but I received it today (Jan. 23). That was fantastic. The only complaint I have is that the front right corner of the console is cracked and the right side doesn’t seem to be fully attached. Now that being said it was a refurbished previously owned. So I wasn’t expecting a brand new console. The crack can be fixed easily with some super glue but I was a bit disappointed. It was packaged really well and the box was undamaged. The rest of the wires and the remote work perfectly fine as well. This is my first day using it and I’ll be sure to update my review in about a week or two after really putting it through various test. Also I do wanna thank the seller because they left a hand written note and a free game inside as well. So thank you. Also for the price I got this at, it’s well worth the money.

name: Alexander
title: Sticky buttons
text: Hello,Playstation works fairly well. Some slight hiccups with software lag and ethernet not being recognized but I was able to fix it and so far the problem has not returned. However, the X key on the controller is sticky. Which is causing some problems during gameplay.Overall, I am just happy to beable to play games. Thank you seller. 4/5

name: Stephanie Benson
title: Limited ability to download games for purchase outside of USA
text: Buyer beware- limited usage and downloading of games to purchase when outside of the USA.  Purchased and went to Caribbean and there isnt a region that matched where I was and couldn't purchase games to download...not pleased as was a gift and the person has limited options. Shame on sony.

name: RoseAnne Sky
title: Product did not work!
text: I bought this for my son's 16th birthday and what a complete bummer that the console kept overheating within 5 minutes of being on and shutting off.  Not to mention it did not come with a power cable and the USB cables did not fit (the rubber connector on each USB was too fat to fit in the narrow slots). So, yes they accepted my return, but I have to pay for the shipping back "using a carrier of my choice."  Real nice!  DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY! I ended up buying a brand new one, which I should have done in the beginning.  Teaches me to never buy refurbished.  SCAMMMM

name: Paul Dotterer
title: disconnects randomly
text: Sadly, as with the PS4 slim's notoriety, the WiFi adapter in this console would regularly disconnect at random, and when it did have connection, it was only 17mb or so upload (out of the 250mbp/s we get) Once it was hardlined into the router/modem combo we have, the connection jumped to 190mbp/s.It also had a bad habit of freezing up due to overheating (ended up putting a box-fan directly under the bloody thing). Still, though, plays games just fine, web searching is stable when it does work and the controller is sturdy. All things considered, it's not bad.

name: zd
title: Didn’t even last a year faulty hard drive!
text: I brought this console for my son’s 13th birthday around August 2019. He was so excited. However right before NYC schools shut down due to COVID 19, the PS4 stop working. An error message displayed to update the hard drive. We went on YouTube and followed the instructions but it didn’t work. We tried the PS4 website that didn’t work. My husband and brother but tried for hours to update the file on the hard drive, to no avail. It would appear to work and then shut down. I wish I would have read the comments about the faulty hard drive before purchasing this console. I tried calling the company but no one answers. My son is devastated this expensive console only lasted 7 months. During the quarantine he is more lonely than ever not being able to play with his friends!!!

name: Nikki
title: Littel wired
text: Ok the ps4 box it came in didnt have any infomation like new products do. It was just a plane wight ps4 box(in picks) no infomation sleve like a new systems have over the boxes. I picked the new in the offers. Amazon should have differnt set ups for that. Reson or a new filter in search engine becuse used systems crap out normaly in about a month!!!!I normaly buy these systems at a game stop or wallmart in store so littel confused a wireded out will update as it gets older

name: soldierguy
title: Good for playing DVD's
text: I don't use the playstation 4 for anything more than playing DVD's I get from Netflix or the library. But the quality of the picture is much improved over my previous ancient PS2..they must have changed something..still using same large screen..Panasonic 30+incher etc...That could change of course..someday..I might go back to playing some console games..I quit console games years ago and just stick with PC gaming..but who knows..I'm not so good with the controller..had hand surgery..easier for me to play games with a keyboard and mouse. Goodluck

name: BluntedNina
title: AMAZING!!
text: I purchased a "Like new" console but I wasn't expecting it to be actually new, it might have been used but it came in perfect conditions with its original packaging, a brand new control, charger and HDMI cable. AND with the Last Of Us game BRAND NEW, I'M SUPER HAPPY.

name: athies22
title: No customer service
text: Sony will happily take hundreds, even thousands of your dollars and then offers zero customer service with actual human beings. This is not a COVID pandemic issue in terms of staffing, they funnel all customer service through bots that do not resolve the problem.I will not be buying from Sony again.

name: Pete
title: PS4 is seriously glitchy
text: This system glitches more times than I can count. Out the box, the console began to glitch immediately, not recognizing clean, brand-new discs. After a few hours of troubleshooting and watching videos online, I finally 'fixed' the ps4 enough to start playing a game on it. A few minutes in, the controller joysticks began to glitch, making my character move without my prompting. It's seriously not worth the buy. PS3 was so much better.

name: schnauzer lover
title: works well after fixing bent fan myself
text: Got this for my sons. Didn't want to pay full price since it is years old. So that was good... had a problem with it cooling. Asked for a refund, then thought about it, decided to Google the problem. Opened the console up and found that the fan was bent. You'd think they would have the machine on and check to see if it cools! Other than that, works just fine. My 14 and 15 yr old are happy

name: Barbara
title: I am not sure whether this was actually new
text: There were no scratches or signs of use, but I felt that this had been opened.  There was no Sony sticky seal to make sure that it hadn't been opened and it was missing the paperwork that usually comes with electronics.  I have had it for a few months now and have had no issues with it.  I just feel that it might not have been completely new, maybe a refurbished that they said was new.  I would not buy from this business again and you should probably skip this.  Beware.

name: Rachel Poole
title: We use this mostly for TV
text: I wanna say I am an avid gamer, but alas I am not. Although i casually game. But it is so responsive, so crisp. I just love this thing. I got it during a black friday sale and got a heck of a deal. Now we use it for all our tv and have gotten rid of our cable completely

name: Kindle Customer
title: 500 GB with a Dualshock 3 Controller
text: Got a PS4 for Dreams after resisting the urge for years, right out of the gate found that the controller was a dualshock 3 and completely useless to me. After getting that sorted out, went into settings and found that this only had 500 GB. While I'm not trying to use this for anything other than Dreams, it does seem like this seller is attempting to scam people. I guess just purchase through Sony directly, and you shouldn't have an issue.

name: LauGA
title: Good console when it works
text: Great console , options , display, online gaming , etc. But in a couple of weeks of use it froze too often, during downloads , updates , or simple browsing. I lost count , really. Also, one of the two USB ports does NOT work. Customer service could not reach technical support on the phone , and I received a very small refund for the cost of ME taking it somewhere to get fixed . This should not happen to a new console bought at full price .I’m keeping it after downloading all these games and overall enjoying it. But quality control is not there .

name: Andrew Boles
title: Bad quality - bad warranty service
text: Very bad quality ..stopped working after 3 months, when I sent to warranty. They didn't fix it and sent it back open and almost broken to me

name: ricardo iza
title: Palabras de agradecimiento
text: Una experiencia muy emotiva era la primera vez que  realizaba una compra, y la atención fue excelente da mucha confianza me llego a tiempo el producto y sin ningún inconveniente sisigan así excelente trabajo

name: V
title: Does what it is expected to do
text: I’ve had this little guy for a good while now. The playing experience had been great. I’ve had a few blue screens but I think that’s from me playing online games connection more than anything. I’ve had this ps4 for a year or so. It’s done what it’s suppose to do. I’m still finding new stuff about it. I’m not tech savvy but I learned a bunch from using this console.

name: A. Wang
title: SCAM
text: THIS is what came in when I was expecting my ps4. I am extremely upset.

name: Nemo
title: Last iteration of the world’s best gaming console
text: Took this as a gift since I play just on PC - beneficial of the present as happy as you know :) That is all I can say about console - Seller shipped it in time, amazon delivered it as advertised. Console was well packed with no signs of tear, wear or damage on outer box :) that’s it folks

name: J
title: Not 1tb as advertised :(
text: It's ad says it's a 1tb hard drive. But received a 500 gig hard drive. Ended up purchasing a 4tb external hard drive. Live and learn I guess. Aside from that it works for my son across the country from me and I can voice chat with him while gaming too.

name: Victoria
title: My grandson would be better giving this review
text: My grandson would be better giving this review. As long as he's happy, I'm happy! Many friends and family have this game system. I purchased this one as a birthday present for him, so that he could play online with some out of state family members (primarily his big brother in Texas) who didn't have an Xbox. He has really enjoyed it, but - being diagnosed as a "special needs" kid - he is also VERY rough on electronic items. We recently found it in need of repair (it stopped being able to read the connection to any controller, not sure of cause), and Sony has been AWESOME in replacing it, at no cost to us. They even sent the postage free box to return it. I have no complaints about this game console, or the manufacturer. Some of the games, on the other hand . . . a totally different story!

name: Allison_Cantrell
title: Piece of junk
text: Stopped working after about 8 months. Went to bring it in for repairs and there were two other people in the store with the exact same problem. Brought it to two different repair stores and neither could figure out how to fix the problem. Save your money and time, and just get an Xbox.

name: Kayla
title: Trash !!
text: Product Arrived one month almost after it was supposed to be here so my sons Christmas was already ruined I ended up purchasing another PlayStation in the meantime for him to have and thank goodness I did that because this one is froze you can’t do anything with it a complete piece of junk my worst Amazon experience thus far . We’ve turned it off and on 100 times plus done things that are supposed to troubleshoot it and you cannot do anything horrible . One selling something at such an inflated price I don’t know how people in good conscious can sell that without even knowing if it actually works yes it turns on but that is it these brand new you can get for over $100 less than what I got for this used one that don’t work never never again !

name: Sharon Pohlman
title: Blue light of death after years
text: Almost right around the 2 year mark I got the Blue Light of Death. Never dropped it or any damage. Still boots to safe mode but only blue light after clicking any options.  Tried software reboot and reinstall. Wondering if new hard drive would help. Ps4 still turns on. Really bummed about the quality of this product... had issues with my ps3 back in the day too. Hoping to get some Sony support about this...

name: ethan s.
title: Buy New or Wait for next gen
text: Reason for 1 star: Had it for 2-3 weeks before it stopped sending a signal to my monitor. Tried different hdmi cables, monitors, and tvs. None of them worked.Concerning but not deal breakers: Additionally, console gets extraordinary hot during basic tasks such as youtube or netflix(thinking something got burnt up n thats the reason that it wont send signal). Slow navigation between games/apps and ps home page.Also, Ps4 on the official sony website is significantly less money

name: Patrick Ferrell
title: Generally happy with console, but why did they have to lose the digital audio output??
text: Good console for the price, but sure wish the nitpicking beancounters hadn't removed the SPDIF optical digital audio output.  Seems like there's a conspiracy to force upgrades on everything these days, not just computers/tech, and now I have to go through crazy gyrations trying to get my older but very nice surround amplifier to work with console.  What a joke.

name: Lyndsay Mulik
title: I need a refund
text: This PlayStation is always giving me error messages. Some games don’t even work, it has crashed twice... Not worth the money!!!

name: S. Cluck
title: Great! Controller is a pest though
text: My PS is working just great! Love the speed, color, and everything. Can't complain about the system itself. The reason I docked a star is because my controller is having issues already. One of the joysticks started having trouble just a week out of the box, and I'm really careful with my electronics - so my controller hasn't been dropped or anything. So sadly, I am going to have to buy a new controller soon and hope that one works better. But at least the system is working great.

name: Nix
title: Shhhh - it's so quiet.
text: Excellent console and the real bonus is that it is sooooo quiet ... My PS3 would about drive me crazy once that fan started running.  Nice form factor and having 1 terabyte of disk space is sure sweet.  I got this over the Ps4 Pro due to cost, energy usage and size; although I still wonder what ESO would've looked like upscaled ;)

name: Canguro
title: Muy buen diseño
text: Está súper ahora a jugar

name: PRDCC
title: GARBAGE
text: Came with the disk drive broken. Gave as a birthday present and can’t return it. NEVER BUY A PS4 on AMAZON

name: Kuehnau
title: No digital audio port on the slim model. Come on Sony, like, for frigging really?
text: If you are even thinking about buying a PS4 then you already know what this is all about. There's no point in talking about Sony or the Playstation 4. You know what it is, you know who they are, you know what to expect.Everything is exactly as it should be. Minus 1-Star for removing the digital audio port on the slim model. Come on Sony, like, for frigging really?

name: L.R. Bowers Jr.
title: So much fun!
text: I love my PS4.  I bought it back in May for my birthday. I love the new layout of the PS OS.  I am can watch Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, You Tube, etc. on it.  The new controller is awesome.  My fav game is RDR2.

name: Carrie Jane
title: Not well made.
text: It’s a shame that the product is only around 2 years old and maybe used 15 times has such major issues.  Try to turn it on and only a blue light blinks for a second and shuts off.  I can hear the fan for maybe a second.  I reached out to PlayStation awhile back was basically told, sorry, the warranty is out.

name: Neil
title: Terrible Piece of Garbage
text: This should be my first and only review ever. Bought this, my second PS4 in the last 5-6 years, due to the pandemic. The first one broke overnight randomly. Started flashing red lights at me. I used it sparingly at that point so I didn't even bother to seek a refund or replacement.Bought this one inside of 4 months ago because I was looking to occupy myself while at home. I only used it a few hours a week and it is suddenly not working.There is no support available from the manufacturer. The tech is total garbage and not worth the investment. If I could leave a zero star review, I would. Do not purchase. Do not bother with the PS5. Read a book instead.

name: Lin
title: Hard drive failure immediately after regular usage
text: Worked well at first, but I only played a few games on it the first year I owned it. Since COVID-19, I used the PS4 weekly and the hard drive failed immediately with regular use. Horrible system for the price point. Will never buy via this seller again. Something seems off with this item given other similar reviews. Not sure if Sony or another is to blame here, but I doubt I’ll get another since I’ve lost all my saved data.

name: Stephen
title: HDD does not work on arrival
text: PS4 would not turn on when arrived and took a while to figure out the issue, but after spending another $100 on hard drives, it finally turns on.

name: Rebecca Lowe
title: Lied about storage space, otherwise good
text: Love it - first PlayStation I’ve had since the PS2. However, I didn’t appreciate that I was lied to about the storage. I should’ve read the reviews before getting it. At least I got 800gb instead of other people saying they got 500gb, but it’s advertised as 1TB, and I’m disappointed that the product description was dishonest.

name: Megan
title: Pretty awesome console
text: Love it!!! Delivery was quick and set up was easy. Have used it quite a bit over the last few months and have had no issues with it!!! Though when I bought it, it said it was brand new but it didn't come in a retail box(didn't have the blue sleeve) And the wires weren't wrapped up. Just seemed like it could've been refurbished. But regardless, it's had zero issues with 200 hours of Skyrim and more than that of Netflix and Spotify and it was still cheaper than buying it in stores!

name: Charles L.
title: Controller malfunctioned after a year of ownership
text: The included controller started having issues with the right joystick, purchased within a year. The cameras in game would move without touching the stick, When moving the right analog stick to move the camera it would swing up constantly and then also to the left now. Games are unplayable and I read dust it the most likely culprit getting into the housing around the base of the analog stick. They should design better controller caps to prevent this from making an otherwise functional controller unusable.

name: Vegan
title: Would plug and play nor ethernet set up
text: Would not set up even with help from Playststion and Xfinity.

name: Ricardo R Fernandez
title: Very Good - Igual que la Ofrecida
text: Muy Buena Para Su Precio

name: Reuben C.
title: PlayStation 4 Is Worth It, Though Pricey
text: The PlayStation 4 came out in “Like New” condition after purchasing from a particular seller at about $285.Not only did my new console arrived in a outer box in good condition with the inner box in much better condition, my new console was in best condition and ready to be played as shown in my attached picture.Most of my experiences from off my new PS4 will be a long story and will keep on growing overtime. This involves my expanding collection of games both digital and my gaming CDs.In other words, I’m optimistic that my new console will last for years!

name: Preston
title: Quit working after just under a year. Seller is MIA
text: It died giving the blue light after a year. I contacted the seller but they have not responded. More wasted money on electronics through Amazon and its sellers.

name: Amoleman
title: As advertised, 1 TB slim Ps4. Good machine so far
text: Came promptly and it good condition. The box was banged up on all the corners so I was worried for the product itself but thats the mailcarriers fault. Sheesh I wish they were more careful... But all in all its been working great, came with all cords necessary, hdmi cable, controller, controller charger and after its updates which took only about 2-5 mins for me(Ive got good wifi here) started gaming away. No complaints as of yet.

name: Elizabeth Howard
title: Been waiting to get one of these, and now my dream is realised.
text: I'm using it to play Birth By Sleep as I write this. It's just amazing - that's about all I can say about it. Definitely worth the money. I'll also be looking forward to playing KH3, which is the reason I bought one of these in the first place. So far, with the Story So Far disc I ordered here, to get reacquainted with the game? No disappointment whatsoever.

name: E.Bentz
title: Great game console, better than the _-box
text: Couldn’t find better price. Got it on amazon prime day. $250.00 with two amazing games, Spider-Man and Horizon Zero Down. All retailers have this for $299.00 and zero games included. Console is brand new.

name: Akbar
title: Might get messed up in under a year
text: Less than a year after purchase it started overheating and then all games including menus started to just freeze up. I think it fried something inside so I'll be returning it to Sony and see if they can do something about it. Very surprised about the quality. My previous ps4 lasted me 4 years and going strong (gave it away)

name: Christian
title: Broken
text: Kept having error codes come up when signing Into playstation accounts plus to turn on I have to reinstall update 7.1 every time and ontop of that it runs so slow and freezes  every time I try to load up a game.

name: Juanita
title: My Daughter Loves It
text: With the pandemic going on and literally millions of people self-quarantining, I had no idea that PS4's would be so hard to come by - or TV's or anything else that actually makes a lot of sense when you think about it. People are bored. Anyway, my daughter wanted her own PS4 for her 7th birthday and every vendor, anywhere, had a wait time of at least three weeks no matter who we bought it from. This was the only vendor to send it to us in about 4 days. It works perfectly. No cosmetic issues, no technical issues, not memory issues - nothing. Thank you so, so much.

name: Johnny
title: Playstation 4
text: El paquete llego en perfecto estado y ya lo estoy usando sin ningun problema.

name: Julia Marinelli
title: SOOO HAPPY WITH MINE!!
text: The product came the next day, literally not even 24 hours later and everything was packaged as advertised. I saw some reviews saying things were not working or things were missing, so I was a little worried.  It said it was used but looked brand new and that was spot on. I would of never known it was used because everything looks untouched. Even the ps4 itself and the controller (which works awesome).I set it up in minutes and everything is working freaking great & I absolutely love it. I’m SOOOO happy with this purchase.

name: Holly L.
title: Intuitive to use, speedy downloads, great graphics, comfortable controller. Love my new PlayStation!
text: Just awesome! Arrived well packaged and super speedy delivery. This console is wonderful. Being new to PlayStation, I'm really impressed so far. I have played on x-boxes exclusively for years, I currently have an Xbox 360 and an Xbox one. For a long time there have been more and more games that I wanted to play that were only available on the PS platform. Don't know why I waited so long to get one, aside from not being rich. So far, this console is intuitive and easy to use. The controller fits my hand well and I think I prefer it over the bulkier Xbox controls. Navigating the system is easy and the downloads and overall play seems speedier and more seamless than I expected. I know some of this relies on your internet speeds, but I can compare this to what I'm used with my other console. I don't want to turn this into a console war as both systems have great features, but I already really love my new PlayStation. The graphics are great. I look forward playing all the games I've wanted to in the past, especially a lot of Japanese imports.Very pleased that I took the leap.

name: nathen horning
title: Not as it seems
text: So. As a system,  it's amazing.  Runs great, looks great. Its a Ps4, you can't go wrong. However,  its advertised as a 1TB console, but irs actually a 500gb console. Which was more than disappointing to say the least.

name: Keegan Cross
title: P.O.S.
text: Only had mine for 4 months and it's constantly needing to send error reports, or the screen will just go black and then the only way to get it to do anything is to unplug it and plug it back in.

name: Alie Williams
title: My husband loves this thing.
text: Works great and have no complaints. I bought this for my OTR husband a few months ago to put in his truck. It handles the abuse of bumping down the road very well. The slim size fits well I the tight quarters of the truck with no problem & the wireless controller is a must.Definitely a good buy.

name: KC
title: Delivery was horrible...customer service rep...awesome
text: This was a gift so I cannot opine on the product itself but the deliver of this product was horrible.  On the bright side, the customer service rep I called, when trying to have delivery effectuated, was awesome!

name: Eleana
title: Llego en buen estado
text: Llego en buen estado

name: Octavo
title: It’s nice
text: It’s ok for ps 4. You should need an extra hard drive the games it’s too much information. Let’s see if your last a year other people have problems with their stuffAnd some people OK with it

name: Izeks mama
title: Disc intake broken, fan issue and glitter
text: Box was smashed on one corner. Power button has silver glitter shoved in it and will not intake any discs. Also, makes loud noise like fan is not working right. Not at all in condition advertised. Requesting a full refund.

name: Ann
title: Excellent customer service
text: This purchase was for my husband. He is like a kid at xmas right now! The second one is still unopened as I am undecided if the kids will get to use it a y time soon. I just wanted to say thank you. Hassle free purchase and delivery.  Love it!

name: raguti
title: Major upgrade from PS3
text: I scooped this one up when it was going for $199 right before Black Friday. Amazing deal and everything that I expected coming from using a PS3. Very speedy processor and huge capacity; will not have to think about storage again. Graphics are a major upgrade from 720p and streaming services run smoothly.

name: Wjean
title: CD reader does not work
text: Used the feedback system for seller but after an hour no response, which to me is unresponsive. I am not pleased.

name: SF Mom
title: I missed PlayStation!
text: Picked up this PS4 Slim 1TB console during an Amazon sale that came with 2 games. I definitely missed playing it and it was easy to pick up and use to get back in the games. I could lie and say it's for my son, but it's really for my grown gaming mom self!

name: Robert
title: You get what you get
text: Came with everything, microphone earbud, power cord, controller, controller charger, HDMI cord, and PS4 slim console in a beautiful PS4 box. On the other hand, not 1 TB. It turned out to be 800 GB. Also, the performance isn’t as good but it does keep me on the game.

name: Hazrat Nabi Muslim Dost
title: Worked perfectly for 3 months then problems began
text: After just 3 months of use the PS4 began to turn off after launching, error messages flood the screen and when you try to resolve the issues more errors pop us, this has caused almost every game to have corrupted data and redownloading them does not help. Customer support has not helped and repairs cost $100+. If you are going to buy this make sure to buy a warranty as you'll need to repair many many times a year.

name: Amazon Customer
title: PS4 seems to have totally bricked after a year and a half
text: So it seems like my PS4 unluckily bricked after 1.5 years. I used it to watch netflix for an hour or two every so ofteb.I got the error screen saying that system storage cannot be accessed CE-34335-8 (which indicates that the hard drive is bricked), i replaced the hard drive and it still gives me the same error message.Im totally unable to boot into safe mode as well so i don't know what to do to fix it.

name: JaimeD
title: Great price and game system
text: I'd been wanting a PS4 for a long time, and I finally decided it was too good to not get one for Christmas.  I only bought one game at the time (RDR2), but I've acquired several more since then.  All the games look amazing!  I've played at least one game a day since getting it.  I highly recommend the PS4 to anyone, great graphics, great games, tons of fun!

name: Karl J T
title: Great job Sony!!
text: The console and system are perfect for what I play, I'm not a VR guy and all that stuff. The system has plenty of power for the games I'm interested in. Love it.

name: Sabrina L.
title: DO NOT BUY!
text: If I could give it half a star I wouldn’t even give it half I’d give it a quarter. Nowhere did it say this was a “ Certified refurbished PlayStation“ but I got one. In description it states headphones are included in package I got a sticky note saying headphones are not included. Horrible.

name: Mike
title: PS-4 Slim 1TB
text: This item is great, got it on a tax free weekend, and free shipping too

name: CLAUDIO
title: Came with a bad controller
text: The Playstation works fine but the controller's audio jack is messed up and the square button does no respond. Tried to get help from their site and was going in circles. Bet you didn't have problems getting my money.

name: Past_DVO_Present
title: It's better and thinner than the old fat boy Ps3 IMHO
text: Quick to set up, more user friendly, and it streams blue ray once set up.  Downside is that it's not backward compatible for my older games.  Guess it sucks to be me....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Get a docking charger or better charger cable
text: Love it. Arrived on time. The only problem was the charging cable for the controller didn't charge it. Luckily it's cheap to get one that works as well as a docking charger for it

name: Amanda
title: Good for small space
text: So I got a good deal on this console and got it so I could play ff online with my boyfriend. If you don’t need a 4K resolution or anything crazy like that I would get this console if you don’t want something bulky.

name: john
title: I like it
text: it's a really good console. I have both Xbox one and ps4. both consoles are good. ps4 has the faster downloads but it has a lot of chat robots. other than at both consoles are pretty the same except for some minor controls and games.

name: Susan
title: Perfect gift
text: This was a Christmas present for my husband three years ago.  It has been great for games, watching movies or running streaming services with.

name: Kevin Strouth
title: Amazing!
text: I ordered this trying to find one for my son and husband as a family gift for Christmas, I ordered it on the 18th, it said it would come by the 30th. I was totally cool with that, it showed up on Christmas Eve, the box was in perfect condition. I love that it came early and in great condition. Everything was in the box as advertised, brand new. Very happy and pleased! Thank you!!!

name: Justin Campos
title: Was on a good sale
text: Got an amazing deal, can't beat that

name: Nuimaster
title: Arrived as expected with no issue from the console or packaging. Easy setup.
text: I mean it's a console, so you get what you pay for. If you're a PC gamer who wants to play God of War and stuff, this makes a decent monitor stand. If you're a console pleb, invest in the Pro to make the most out of your games.

name: David Lacayo
title: These controllers are damaged
text: I ordered this Playstation bundle in February and had to order a second controller in April. It just decided to stop working. It was fully charged and it turned off and never turned on again. I took it to uBreakiFix and they diagnosed it irreparable. There is a 1-year warranty for this where you have to ship it to Texas (pay it yourself and costs around $25) where it has to meet the warranty conditions in order to be repaired and sent back and I was not willing to take that risk. The quickest  solution unfortunately was to buy a new one. Now that new controller started bugging since the first month and it has been consistently getting worst. Today it is almost impossible to play without it being in the way of gameplay. I find it very unfair to have to buy 3 controllers in a 6 month period when I have taken good care of them.

name: Danielle
title: Perfect
text: Just like new! Clean, ready to go with controller and even a gift game!! Also came before Christmas even with delays! Amazing seller!!

name: alex
title: Disappointed :(
text: This is our first and probably last playstation console. Lasted a little over a year, several freeze ups, and now it wont recognize an internet connection....very disappointed.  My son can't use it for his favorite games!

name: Mangoicetea92
title: God of war and battlefield look amazing.
text: Product runs great and quietly. Only got a 4 star because the packaging was hand delivered open and a tiny piece cracked off. I'm no one to complain about a tiny cosmetic crack , but the open box I did complain about. So far weeks gone by runs smooth. My advice get a power surge as well to protect it.

name: Nicholas McNelia
title: Not cool
text: PS4 box with a crap old laptop inside! This is total garbage

name: Kushal Sharma
title: It's a fantastic console with a few weird things in the software
text: Love the product. The only reason I took away a star is that adding new people with controller is a weird process where each person is forced to sign into an account or play as a guest for their controller to be used. The process of activating multiple controllers is also not intuitive at all. Unnecessary user lock-in features that annoy more than they help.

name: M. LaShelle
title: A-
text: The short bit: I love it! However, the menu design could be a little simpler and easier to locate some things I didn't have any trouble with on PS3. Wish I could give it a 4.5 but 5 stars is fine. Not to say the visual design isn't nice and useful occasionally. Just lots of stuff I am not going to use.  There are notifications that help you to learn where things are. So, that helps anything negative I have to say.Couple first impression pros and cons:It got a little warm on the cheap paint in this new house. Feet got stuck and one popped off. Great no-glue design to pop it right back in there. Sticky feet would not have been smart. (Just like with many other devices that get a little warm.)I haven't had an issue with it getting hot. Just warm. Put it in rest mode and it will cool down pretty fast between games.I love rest mode. Solves the controller power problem. You can also set when the USBs stop funneling power to other devices.Load times are ridiculous but if you're playing from a first release disc it will let you skip the updates and start playing. Thank goodness. If you're planning to load a couple games and set things up in the menu before you begin, you're looking at 2-3 hours. I fell asleep waiting on updates the first time I plugged it in.It will sometimes error out of games and send an error report. Something I never experienced with PS3. But, being a Mac user, as long as they stay on top of those updates and actually fix them I'm game. Tbd. I'll come back and play later. Haven't had an issue with that so far. It only errored out once in the last two weeks. Came back later and was able to play.PS4 Slim is about the same size as PS3 Slim without the awkward shape and sacrificing features. It's a hell of a lot heavier but times have changed.Careful removing plugs from the back. They're real snug on this one. Hurt my hand a few times. I'm not sure if that's good or bad. I guess it depends on the situation. I like magnets that snap off. Macbooks have spoiled me.Still my favorite way to play games! I strictly work on my computers in a field that requires a lot of processing power. So, I stick to consoles. They don't need all that negativity in my free time too. Haha All around improved in the social entertainment and app entertainment category. I like it so far.However, my review of the mic it comes with is not so sunny: Sony Playstation 4 (PS4) Mono Chat Earbud with Mic   https://www.amazon.com/gp/review/R2DUSC7R2IRWTZ?ref_=glimp_1rv_cl Very cheap. Not designed for all players. Great idea though.

name: Anonymous
title: Great system!
text: I love my PS4, but unfortunately one of the controllers was broke when I purchased it. I just recently realized when my boyfriend started playing a game that requires him to click the right joystick—it does not work at all. Besides that, it’s a great PlayStation and we use it a lot!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Freezes occasionally during high-intensity play.
text: It works well enough. Our only complaint is that it freezes sometimes during high-intensity gameplay. For example when playing Diablo3 with 3 players in local, when fighting large groups of enemies it will sometimes freeze for a second. It's not a huge issue, but it's annoying in a brand new console.

name: White Mamba
title: Trash
text: I've owned a PS4 in the past. It was a great product. This one is a piece of plastic trash. Either the seller is reselling crapped out units or the slim is a genuine piece of garbage.

name: Todd M. Baham
title: PS4 #2
text: With the PS5 set to drop this year, it almost seems a waste to buy a PS4, but I needed a second console. I'm glad for the additional memory, and the unit works perfectly.

name: Claire
title: system okay - packaging issue
text: I got this for my niece for her birthday and when she opened it the box showed that it included the spiderman game - except that it did not - so she was disappointed. They did refund me $10 but if you are going to sell something make sure that what it says on the box is what is in the box.

name: Kat Facepunch
title: fun for the indoor kids!
text: just as we imagined! using this gem to replace our old and very noisy PS3. have only had time to play one game but Mortal Kombat X was, for sure, not a let down. after another order of the same item, different seller, got shipped back due to damages and some lengthy chats with amazon, we got our moneys worth for sure!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Too many usb error..over..and over
text: So from the start this was a slow, inferior product.  Then I started getting the too many usb error.  Resetting the settings and erasing it fixed it a few times.  But no longer.  So I have a brick.

name: David L. Kelly
title: It's an x-mas gift.  Not opened yet!!
text: Being asked to review something a) with in 2hrs of arrival, b) it's an x-mas gift so haven't even tried it, c) don't have the slightest knowledge on how to set it up and use it

name: Dionte
title: Great Harddrive for PS4 (once formatted)
text: This product came much faster than initially quoted to be delivered. I specifically bought this for my PS4. You have to use a laptop to changed the formatting type of the hard drive. Once completed it worked fine.I do think they should include that in the description.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Great! Would buy again
text: Came with everything listed and in perfect condition! Delivered quickly which was great since it’s a birthday present. We did plug it in and everything works perfectly very satisfied

name: Nichelle Skarsgård
title: PS4 Slim is great
text: Very good machine. I have this for over 2 years and it's still working in good shape. The best part is 1TB helps a lot than 500gb.  This is great if you don't need VR for it and have a 4k tv , any tv will do just fine for it.

name: Josh.
title: Quick delivery
text: I bought this product and absolutely fell in love with it. Switching from Xbox to PS4 has been great and after having this item for over a year I haven’t had any issues or concerns. I use it every day for gaming as well as watching movies and tv shows.

name: Kevin D. Ray
title: PS4
text: I love my PS4! My only complaint is I wish the graphics were PC level!
